Category: Custom | Dark Matter in Cyberspace <<<<<<< HEAD 2015-06-01T12:52:39+08:00 http://leetschau.github.io/ Li Chao ======= 2015-05-26T17:50:21+08:00 http://leetschau.github.io/ Li Chao leetschau@gmail.com >>>>>>> 07ed3639e773b839d5491a4f5cd36dc20296d73c Octopress Add Custom Fields on Issues of Project in Redmine 2014-02-13T16:39:50+08:00 http://leetschau.github.io/blog/2014/02/13/163950

Check items under “Trackers” to enable a custom field for a specific tracker.

Add this custom field to “Selected columns”.

That’s it. When you create a new issue via [Project -> New Issue], this field will show in definition panel.
